FileFormat.FormatDescription: SGML/XML entity files are plain text files, often found alongside, and referenced by, xml and sgml files. Ent files list the parameters and entity declarations for a specific set of tags defined in a Document Type Definition.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: National Library of Australia / National Library of Australia
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 11/2023 (v.115)- internal signature removed for extension only identification. Submitted by Preservica.
